item.description:
Please come network with us!

My schedule has been extremely hectic over the past few months and I cannot devote as much time to running Boston Ecademy. I have decided to organize Boston Ecademy meetings on a bi-monthly basis. So mark you calendars for 2006. We'll be meeting only six times this year: January, March, May, July, September and November.

Agenda for March 2006 Meeting:

6:00 - 6:30PM Introductions
6:30 - 7:00PM Roundtable Discussions
7:00 - 7:30PM Guest Speaker - Curtis Muldrew
7:30 - 8:00PM Speed Networking

Meeting adjourns at 8:00PM.

Be sure to plan a one minute introduction of who you are and what you are looking to accomplish in networking.

Members who RSVP by March 22nd pay $6.00 fee for the meeting. (Member Signup is Free at this site.)

All others and those who register at the door pay $10.00.

IMPORTANT: If you arrive after 6:00PM, the front doors will be locked. Please call me on my cell phone (617-429-6571) and I will open the door for you.

- Phil
item.name: Boston Ecademy March 2006 Meeting
